line_2: Or he, who seeks in bloody Wars,

line_1: The veteran thus displays his scars,
line_2: After the thunder of the wars,

line_1: By sweat and blood, and worthy scars.
line_2: And some are born to win the stars,

line_1: He fights o'er his old battles, and vaunts of his scars:
line_2: 'Tis thus when the soldier returns from the wars,

line_1: In glorious Triumphs, and dishonest Scars.
line_2: A dreadful Series of Intestine Wars,

line_1: Worn out with Age, and cover'd o'er with Scars,
line_2: As some wise Leader, in successful Wars,

line_1: Titles from France; from Sweden Wounds and Scars,
line_2: And batter'd Bones they bring from Belgick Wars;
NOT that you need Assistance in your Wars,

line_1: Honour the man, my lads, seam'd o'er with scars!
line_2: "Welcome, old soldier, welcome from the wars!
